name: (Unfinished TD Game)
description:
Unfinished shitty game :sadge:

Check out the code here: https://github.com/Hambonaire/OU-Nov-Jam-Code

--- Build 02 ---

I took some time to clean up and finish some of the base mechanics I wanted to implement that I didn't have the time to for the Jam; things like the actual waves, a different tower and upgrade type, getting power-ups that you can carry over (not fully implemented yet) and the basic iteration of "runs".

--- Build 01 ---

Supposed to be a rogue-like(-ish/-lite/i dunno)/tower defense sort of mash up where you would get resources and you would have to decide weather to save gold for the next run vs using it in that run and losing it if you died to match the "Leave Something Behind Theme."

Bit off a bit more than I could chew, but thats what I do for every jam it seems., doh!

Unfortunately most of the mechanics arent implemented as I was only able to start on Friday instead of having the whole week to work on the project.

Most assets in this one are from Kenney Assets.
